  • Method Details

    • addRider

      void addRider(String name, String teamName) throws exceptions.CyclingException
      Add a new rider to the portal.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the rider.
      teamName - The name of the team the rider belongs to.
      Throws:
      exceptions.CyclingException - If the rider cannot be added.

    • removeRider

      void removeRider(String name) throws exceptions.RiderNotFoundException, exceptions.CyclingException
      Remove a rider from the portal.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the rider to be removed.
      Throws:
      exceptions.RiderNotFoundException - If the rider is not found.
      exceptions.CyclingException - If the rider cannot be removed.

    • getRiderDetails

      Rider getRiderDetails(String name) throws exceptions.RiderNotFoundException
      Get the details of a specific rider.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the rider.
      Returns:
      The rider object.
      Throws:
      exceptions.RiderNotFoundException - If the rider is not found.

    • addTeam

      void addTeam(String teamName) throws exceptions.CyclingException
      Add a new team to the portal.
      Parameters:
      teamName - The name of the team.
      Throws:
      exceptions.CyclingException - If the team cannot be added.

    • removeTeam

      void removeTeam(String teamName) throws exceptions.CyclingException
      Remove a team from the portal.
      Parameters:
      teamName - The name of the team to be removed.
      Throws:
      exceptions.CyclingException - If the team cannot be removed.

      Team getTeamDetails(String teamName) throws exceptions.TeamNotFoundException
      Get the details of a specific team.
      Parameters:
      teamName - The name of the team.
      Returns:
      The team object.
      Throws:

    • createRace

      void createRace(String raceName) throws exceptions.CyclingException
      Create a new race in the portal.
      Parameters:
      raceName - The name of the race.
      Throws:
      exceptions.CyclingException - If the race cannot be created.

    • addStageToRace

      void addStageToRace(String raceName, Stage stage) throws exceptions.RaceNotFoundException, exceptions.CyclingException
      Add a stage to an existing race.
      Parameters:
      raceName - The name of the race.
      stage - The stage to be added.
      Throws:
      exceptions.RaceNotFoundException - If the race is not found.
      exceptions.CyclingException - If the stage cannot be added.

    • recordRaceResult

      void recordRaceResult(String raceName, String stageName, String riderName, long time) throws exceptions.RaceNotFoundException, exceptions.StageNotFoundException, exceptions.RiderNotFoundException, exceptions.CyclingException
      Record the result of a rider in a specific stage of a race.
      Parameters:
      raceName - The name of the race.
      stageName - The name of the stage.
      riderName - The name of the rider.
      time - The time taken by the rider to complete the stage.
      Throws:
      exceptions.RaceNotFoundException - If the race is not found.
      exceptions.StageNotFoundException - If the stage is not found.
      exceptions.RiderNotFoundException - If the rider is not found.
      exceptions.CyclingException - If the result cannot be recorded.

    • addRiderToStage

      void addRiderToStage(String raceName, String stageName, String riderName) throws exceptions.RaceNotFoundException, exceptions.StageNotFoundException, exceptions.RiderNotFoundException, exceptions.CyclingException
      Add a rider to a specific stage of a race.
      Parameters:
      raceName - The name of the race.
      stageName - The name of the stage.
      riderName - The name of the rider.
      Throws:
      exceptions.RaceNotFoundException - If the race is not found.
      exceptions.StageNotFoundException - If the stage is not found.
      exceptions.RiderNotFoundException - If the rider is not found.
      exceptions.CyclingException - If the rider cannot be added to the stage.
